remarks: A set of atoms is a subset of the projective map of its LUB. (Contributed by NM, 6-Mar-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
sspmaplub.u $e |- U = ( lub ` K ) $.
sspmaplub.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
sspmaplub.m $e |- M = ( pmap ` K ) $.
sspmaplubN $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ S C_ A ) -> S C_ ( M ` ( U ` S ) ) ) $.
